Name: The Siege of Brimir
About the game: Fight against all humanity in this video game where you are the villain. You are an alien with superpowers sent to earth to prepare the conquest of the Planet. Your first target is Brimir, one of the most advanced nations on earth. If they cannot fight against you no other country can. Open world You explore the world as you wish and the end goal is to defeat all human forces from Brimir. You will have to get stronger and improve your skills in order to accomplish your goal. The army might seem weak, but enough of them will make you suffer. Protect your ship at all cost, it is the source of your power and if it is destroyed the game is lost. The human army knows that so they will not doubt on making surprise attacks. Arena Play in a small map against a number of enemies and try to defeat them. Do you want to have a fight against an entire naval force or have an air battle against a complete air squadron, this is your place.
